node.title: Vladimir Putin blames the West for migrant crisis on Poland-Belarus border
node.alt: Armoured security forces stand with riot shields
node.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin says Western countries, rather than Belarus, are ultimately responsible for the migrant crisis on the Poland-Belarus border, pointing to the instability caused by wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.
node.content:
["Russian President Vladimir Putin says Western countries, rather than Belarus, are ultimately responsible for the migrant crisis on the Poland-Belarus border, pointing to wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.", "As the EU prepares to impose new sanctions on Minsk, Mr Putin told Russian state television Belarus was not to blame for the crisis.", "\"Let's not forget where these crises with migrants came from \u2026 Is Belarus a pioneer in these problems? No, the reasons were created by Western and European countries themselves,\" Mr Putin said.", "Referring to conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan, Mr Putin noted that Iraqi Kurds and Afghans were among the migrants at the Belarusian border.", "\"Belarus has nothing to do with it \u2026\u00a0the fact they've come via Belarus is unsurprising because Belarus \u2026\u00a0has visa-free entry for the countries of origin,\" he said.", "", "
Mr Putin says Russia has nothing to do with the flow of migrants to Europe.(Kremlin: Aleksey Nikolskyi)
", "Mr Putin's comments came as Polish police reported the discovery of the body of a young Syrian man near the border town of\u00a0Wolka Terechowska.", "\"Before noon, a forest worker informed the police about finding a corpse of a young man,\" border police spokesman\u00a0Tomasz Krupa\u00a0said.", "\"After the inspection by the police, doctors and the prosecutor's office, the cause of death could not be determined with certainty.", "\"The prosecutor's office has handed the body over to the forensic pathology unit of the court to find an answer to that question.\"", "Mr Krupa said it had been a \"calm night\" in terms of attempted breaches of the border fence by migrants, with only a couple of interventions involving police and border guards.", "", "
Asylum seekers hoping to enter Poland are dealing with freezing conditions.
", "
Russia's role
", "The crisis is creating another point of tension between the West and Belarus, and by extension with its closest ally,\u00a0Russia.", "Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko played ice hockey on Saturday (local time), apparently brushing off the threat of new international sanctions over the\u00a0migrant crisis on the border with the European Union.", "The European Union, Poland and other states bordering Belarus accuse Mr Lukashenko of manufacturing the migrant crisis by facilitating the illegal crossing.\u00a0They say Russia is\u00a0supporting the effort.", "In fact, Poland's Prime Minister has accused Mr Putin of masterminding the migrant crisis.", "Though Russia this week sent nuclear-capable strategic bombers and paratroopers to patrol over Belarus in a show of support, Mr Putin\u00a0denied allegations of being involved in creating the flow of migrants to Europe.", "\"I want everyone to know that we have nothing to do with it,\" Mr Putin said in excerpts, released on Saturday, of an interview with state television that will be broadcast in full on Sunday.", "He said no Russian aviation companies carried\u00a0the migrants to Belarus, and the West was the\u00a0root cause for the crisis, saying\u00a0military operations in Iraq and elsewhere had\u00a0led to continued conflict in the region.", "EU officials, however, say they have evidence the Lukashenko regime has helped migrants cross the border illegally by offering visas, arranging their transportation to the border, and showing them unguarded areas through which to cross.", "A large number of migrants are in a makeshift camp on the Belarusian side of the border in frigid conditions.", "Polish authorities report daily new attempts by the migrants to breach the border. The situation shows no signs of ending soon.", "wires/ABC"]
